title: episode002 – Entering GACIS HQ
blurb: In which the oldest residence in Juneau becomes enshrined in a giant snowglobe...

title: episode001 – Palin Picks the Right Shoes
blurb: In which our nearly middle-aged IT hero, Palin Warwick, isn't worried about wearing goretex shoes, since it hardly rains in Juneau anymore...

title: episodeNEXT - coming up...
